QuestData.Title: Invasion of Space
QuestData.Description: We are on the Legion home world, but we must not let ourselves get caught unawares.$b$bThese invasion points can bolster their forces and ruin our plans. By defeating them on their territory we also damage their command and infrastructure.$b$bSlay the commanders and stop their invading forces. The fight to push the Legion back begins now!
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat any $1oa commanders in Invasion Points.
